long_description: Make your daily urban treks a breeze with the Turnstile Daypack from Marmot. It holds your laptop and tablet, as well as your water bottle, jacket, lunch and so much more. Padded sleeve fits most 15 in. laptops; a separate internal sleeeve can hold a tablet or e-reader. External slash pocket stows on-the-go essentials. Webbing waistbelt can be removed; sternum strap stabilizes the load. Internal organizer and key clip; external loop can hold a flashing clip-on light (not included). Marmot Turnstile Daypack provides gear and water bottle pockets for your active adventures.
short_description: Make your daily urban treks a breeze with the Turnstile Daypack from Marmot. It holds your laptop and tablet, as well as your water bottle, jacket, lunch and so much more.
